global_rules: Use only plausible, real-word distractors; avoid non-words or invented forms.
Ensure all four options A/B/C/D have different text; no duplicate options.
answer_explanation must describe only the correct option and must not reference or contradict wrong options.
If the stem has a blank, each option must be a phrase that fits the blank grammatically; avoid full clauses as options for a single blank.
Ensure all passage content is factually accurate; avoid false or misleading claims in stems or passages.
For peer feedback/editing items: ensure the feedback describes an actual error present in the draft; avoid describing errors that don't exist.
If the stem has a blank, each option must be a phrase that fits the blank grammatically; avoid full clauses as options for a single blank.
